remarks.format: ## Remarks 当粘贴操作选择了要粘贴的数据格式，但在实际粘贴数据之前，会发生该事件。The event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste as, but before the data is actually pasted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最初，此属性包含与 属性中存储的相同的 。Initially this property contains a that is identical to that stored in the property. 自定义粘贴事件处理程序可以 通过设置此属性来指定要粘贴的新建议。Custom pasting event handlers can specify a new suggested to paste by setting this property. 存储在此属性中的必须具有至少一种数据格式，在设置此属性时，它将自动应用于该 属性。A stored in this property must have at least one data format, the first of which is automatically applied to the property when this property is set.

exception.span: 当尝试将此属性设置为 null 时引发\*\*\*\*。

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.

exception.span: 尝试将此属性设置为不包含任何数据格式的数据对象时，将会引发该异常。

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to a data object that contains no data formats.
